wikipedia_page.main: Jason Chan (born 12 December 1977) is a British-born Hong Kong actor and television presenter. He started off at TVB hosting a variety of English Pearl lifestyle shows, which required the use of his proficiency in various languages: English, Cantonese, Mandarin, French, and Latin.

link_mentions.page: TVB Anniversary Award for Most Improved Male Artiste

response: * Jason Chan Chi-san (born 1977), Hong Kong actor and television presenter

No Good Either Way is a Hong Kong television comedy-drama serial produced by TVB under executive producer Amy Wong. It stars Ruco Chan, Kristal Tin and Louis Yuen, with Natalie Tong, Jason Chan Chi-san, Stephen Au and Florence Kwok as the major supporting cast. The first episode premiered on 11 June 2012.
